title: How many times do you afk before your account is suspended?
body: If the answer is never then that would be silly.

replies.body: Depends on the intention.  Unintentionally getting marked as a leaver will trigger [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) and continue to stack lower priority queues until the issue causing it is resolved.  Intentionally leaving matches will likely result in the PB team auditing the account with a suspension.
